title: Phone app: can't ignore incoming calls
content:
Since recently, whenever I get an incoming call and want to silence it and turn off the screen by pressing the power button, the screen goes blank, call ringtone is silenced, but after a second - the screen comes on again showing the incoming call. 
Additionally to the full screen incoming call notification, I also see the popup notification on top.

Phone app version is latest 33.0.249138098.
